array.string: [ti:Connecting]Connecting
[al:Download feat.初音ミク]Download feat.初音ミク初音未来
[00:00.25]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权//
[00:00.26]kotoba ： halyosy Connecting - hatsu ne mi ku
[00:01.38]Find a reason to sing 寻觅歌唱的理由
[00:06.96]那个教会我歌唱的你 uta u ko to oxi e te ku le ta kimi ni
[00:22.27]谁人撒落的乐章 dale ka ga kobo su MELODY wo
[00:26.82]dale ka ga hirotte 有谁人将其拾起
[00:33.02]名字样子都不知晓 na mae mo kao mo wa ka la na i
[00:37.32]cuna ga lu ki seki ga 相连的奇迹
[00:43.90]而我只是透过画面 一味的凝望生羡 ga men go xi ta da naga me uraya n de ba ka li i ta
[00:51.36]yima ma de wa 至今为止
[00:54.14]Find a reason to sing 寻觅歌唱的理由
[00:59.64]我便能忘却时间沉迷其中 ji kan wo wasu le mu chuu ni na le ta n da
[01:04.83]Find a reason to sing 寻觅歌唱的理由
[01:10.05]神明馈赠的礼物 kami sama ni ata e la le ta o ku li mo no
[01:15.91]与你的歌曲相连 Connecting connecting with your song
[01:19.44]Connecting connecting with your dream 与你的梦想相依
[01:23.75]与你相连 Connecting with you
[01:36.06]一路走来我们 赢了什么 输了什么 boku la wa nani to tataka i nani ni yabu le te
[01:43.29]nani wo wuxina te ki ta da lo u 失去了什么
[01:51.23]扭曲的言语 yuga n da koto ba ga
[01:53.87]dale ka no niqi jyou wo uba u 夺走谁人的日常
[02:05.08]至今为止 yima ma de wa
[02:07.94]寻觅歌唱的理由Find a reason to sing
[02:10.64]kimi to uta e ba 和你共同吟唱
[02:18.52]寻觅歌唱的理由Find a reason to sing
[02:21.20]yi cu ka hana so u
[02:23.87]qi a n to me wo mi te 我会好好看着你的双眼
[02:29.75]Connecting connecting with your song 与你的歌曲相连
[02:34.94]与你的人生相系 Connecting connecting with your life
[02:37.63]Connecting with you 与你相连
[02:48.31]Everything's too hard for me right now 现在 每件事 于我皆举步维艰
[02:52.90]载入梦想 Download
[02:53.54]Everything's a little crazy right now 现在 每件事 都似乎有些疯狂
[02:58.22]最真的感情Upload
[02:59.12]do u xi te hito wa megu li a u no da lo u 人们为何辗转相遇
[03:09.41]而接下来又会发生些什么 so u xi te tsugi wa nani ga o ki lu no ka
[03:14.51]Maybe nobody knows 也许无人能预料
[03:23.45]如无处可去 yi ki ba wo na ku xi ta
[03:26.13]a no kolo no boku no yo u ni 那时候的我
[03:33.93]到底被你的温柔 kimi no yasa xi sa ni
[03:36.57]do le da ke suku wa le ta da lo u 拯救了多少次
[03:43.13]这次该轮到我 主动和他人相系 tsugi wa boku ga dale ka wo cuna ge ru ban da
[03:51.06]Find a reason to sing 寻觅歌唱的理由
[03:56.30]若能忘却时间沉迷其中 ji kan wo wasu le mu chuu ni na le lu na la
